attributes.action: support the right of same-sex couples to get married.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government has made much of its commitment to "equality" yet it stopped short of realising that goal. Civil Partnerships are patronising and semantically meaningless. "Separate but equal" as a concept should have died 40 years ago, it's now up to the government to kill it.
